title: #65: Profiling S-Town
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) discuss the smash hit podcast S-Town. Jim and Laura profile the main characters and give their thoughts on the holes in the mystery.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
